text:
@tedcruz You're just lying & blowing up on the faux Indignation charts in a defensive move to protect your ridiculous Orange Menace?

The ORANGE MENACE that called your wife a dog in front of the entire nation?

Did #Trump eat your spine?

#CannibalTrump #SupremeLoser #COVID19 #TrumpTaxes https://t.co/1ov3COWlU3
